description:
HTC is a SEI-CMM Level 5 IT solutions provider, focused on providing business value to our clients through Information Technology (IT) and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO). An Inc 500 Hall of Fame Company and Certified Minority-Owned Business, HTC has Global Delivery Centers in the United States, United Kingdom, India, Malaysia, Singapore and Australia.
HTC also has over 3200 employees worldwide, and our global delivery model translates to reduced development time and significant cost reduction for our clients.
